description:
- Summer Hiking Wear: Lime "Linen resort wear with a cool and comfortable feel. "
 - Kid's Hiking Wear: Lime "Children's linen resort wear with a cool and comfortable feel. "
*You can buy it at any time in the game shop (Clothing Store in Castle St.) when you purchase it. 
 - Summer Boater Hat: Lime "A resort-style boater hat with floral decorations. "
*You can buy it at any time in the game shop (Fashion Store in Castle St.) when you purchase it.
name: Summer Hiking Wear Set: Lime
